name: Cordless Drill Set, KELNOW 21V PowerDrill with Power Pack and Charger, 3/8-Inch Keyless Chuck ElectricDrill, 25+1 Position, 2 Speed, 27pcs Drilldriver Bits Tool Drills for DIY Projects
short_description: 21V Cordless Drill Set: KELNOW Power drills are compact and powerful. Not only drive screws 3x faster than hand tools, but also without hunting for outlets. It can help you quickly assemble IKEA furniture or silently fix wobbly shelves, making it a must-have power tool for the home!

Power and control: high-quality motor provides up to 370 In-lbs Max of torque, which can help you do some intense work; 25 +1 torque control and 2 speed allows you to flexibly control your power according to different use scenarios
Working comfortably is also important: the drill has an ergonomically designed grip for a comfortable hold on the job; it's lighter in weight and smaller in size to reduce arm fatigue on the job.

LED light and fast charging: LED light allows you to easily work in dark environments, such as inside cabinets or garages at night; 1-hour fast charging with a high-capacity power pack meets most of the home work needs

27Pcs Accessories: Our electric cordless drill with 27Pcs accessories: 6 drill bits, 9 screwdrivers, 9 Socket, 1 extension rod, 1 Socket extension, 1 flexible shaft driver. The 3/8' keyless chuck allows for quick replacement of various accessories. If your cordless power drill has quality problems or have any questions, please feel free to contact with us, we are always here. If additional batteries need to be purchased, we will always respond!

name: Cordless Drill Set, 336 in-lbs Torque, 3/8" Keyless Chuck, Electric Power Drill with 2.0Ah Battery and Charger,18+1 Position,25-Piece 20V Drill Driver Kit, ADJZ2035
short_description: [336 in-lbs and 18+1 Clutch] The 20V 3/8-inch keyless chuck power drill delivers 336 in-lbs of torque and features 18+1 clutch settings for precise control, helping to prevent overdriving or stripping screws. It is suitable for various materials: wood (φ3/4 inch), metal (φ2/5 inch), and walls.

[Extended Run Time with 2.0Ah Battery] This cordless drill set provides 33% more run time than a 1.5Ah battery, allowing you to drive through 800 screws on a full charge or drill through a 19/16-inch thick wooden board for 100 times.

[Versatile 2-Speed Transmission] Adjust the speed between 0-400 RPM and 0-1500 RPM for customized performance in both screw driving and drilling tasks with this electric drill, making it ideal for DIY projects as well as more demanding applications.
[Flexible Shaft & LED Light] The drill driver kit includes a flexible shaft bit extension and a built-in LED light, making working in tight, dark spaces easier.

[Durable Pure Copper Motor] The pure copper motor provides 1.5x more power, allowing it to drill through a 19/16-inch thick wooden board in just 8 seconds. The DCA drill has robust overload resistance and a large vent to prevent overheating.
[Compact and lightweight design] Weighing only 2.8 pounds, the ergonomic design will not burden your body even after extended use.
[What will You Get] 1 x 20V Power Drill Driver, 21 x Drilling/Driver Bits, 1 x Flexible Shaft Drill Bit Extension Kit, 1 x 2.0Ah Li-ion battery, 1 x 20V charger.

name: 20V Cordless Drill, Electric Power Drill Set with Battery Charger, 3/8” Keyless Chuck, 2 Variable Speed, 18+3 Torque, 72pcs Driver Bits and Belt Hook, Red
short_description: 【20 Voltage & 2 Variable Speeds】 Higher voltage means more torque-spinning strength to overcome resistance.This 2 variable-speed ( 0-550 & 0-1550 RPM ) cordless drill with an adjustable clutch gives you the versatility for drilling different materials and using a variety of bits.The low speed is for driving screws, the high speed is for drilling holes.

【18+3 Position Clutch & 40Nm Max Torque】 This cordless drill's clutch provides precise control for drilling, which helps to prevent sinking a screw too deep, stripping out the head of a screw or even breaking a screw shaft.

【2000mAh Battery】20V(DC) 2000mAh Lithium-Ion battery packed with higher capacity indicator lets you finish your job smoothly with long lasting performance. 1-hour fast charger keeps your drill constantly running.

【3/8" Keyless Metal Chuck & LED Work Light】A 3/8 inch cordless drill accepts a wide range of bits, making it versatile for common tasks around the house. The Forward/Reverse switch allows you to either screw or replace/remove bits for your purposes. LED Light for increased visibility in enclosed workspaces and dark environment.

【Wealth of Accessories】Carrying case contains: Yellow plastic expansion tube 8 specifications(10); Blue plastic expands 5 sizes(10); Red plastic expands 6 sizes(10); The sharp head attacks the 4*20(10), and the 5*18(10); wire fasteners 1.7x15(5); Flathead self-attack 3x16(5); 150 long cardan axis(1); Cross one word batch head 65 long(3); Twist drill 5 specifications(1), 6 specifications(1); Flat drill 10 specifications(1), 12 specifications(1); Thread drill 5 specifications(1); 6 handles 6 specifications(1); Pagoda drill 4-12mm (1); Six handle pagoda drill 4-20mm of (1).

name: Fanttik K2 Ultra 7.4V Power Drill, Cordless Drill/Driver, 3/8'' Keyless Chuck, Max. 30 N.m, Max. 1250 RPM, TapSwitch Gear Change, 2.5AH Rechargeable Battery, Tool Kit for Home DIY Projects
short_description: Powerful Performance: The cordless drill is designed for both strength and intelligence. With a VoltiPulse brushless motor and impressive torque of up to 30 N.m and a speed of 1250 RPM, it easily handles a wide range of DIY tasks such as furniture assembly and appliance repairs. Whether working with wood, metal, or plastic, it meets the needs of light home repairs, DIY projects, and light construction.

Smart Interaction: Featuring an innovative dual-screen design. It provides real-time information for greater efficiency. The side screen shows the rotation direction, while a long press activates the lock function. The main screen clearly displays the screwdriver or drill mode along with the corresponding torque and speed settings to tackle a variety of tasks.

Intuitive One Press Gear Shift: The power drill features the revolutionary TapSwitch electronic gear shifting system for smarter, more efficient operation. Unlike traditional drills that require manual gear shifts, it allows you to switch between screwdriver and drill modes with just one touch.

30% Shorter than Traditional Power Drill: K2 Ultra only 5.51 inches (front to back), the compact design makes it easy to carry and store. It also comes with a stylish stand that not only holds high-quality drill and screwdriver bits but also elegantly showcases the tool's design. The built-in accessory box contains 10 drill bits and 10 screwdriver bits for daily household use.

Long-Lasting Battery Life: Equipped with a 2500mAh high-capacity lithium battery, the cordless drill offers long-lasting power, allowing you to complete more tasks on a single charge. It uses a Type-C charging interface for easy and universal compatibility, enabling fast energy replenishment anytime, anywhere.
